data.what_is:
Sales & Marketing Automation Software.  We focus on Workflow & CRM Automation for Sales Professionals, Sales Leaders, Small and Mid-Size Sales Organizations, and Local Businesses. 

We specialize in Sales Conversion to help business owners increase their Sales Revenue, Customer Retention, and gain New Business using our proprietary ALL IN ONE CRM Software to manage their Sales Pipeline and Lead Nurture.


Customized Local Business Digital Marketing Strategies. We offer Lead Management, Lead Nurturing, Social Media and Reputation Marketing, Video Marketing, Email Marketing, Direct Digital Mail, SMS, SEO, CRM, SAAS, and Product Promotion for Small Businesses.

initial_reviews.review_title: I have been doing B2B for 30 years and have implemented and used several CRM software
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EzyTise?
The ease-of-use, turn key for all aspects of digital sales & marketing, rapid deployment and adoption rate by employees.  Other products on the market are too complex to deploy, maintain and don't include all of what Ezytise offer.
Furthermore, Ezytise provides a personal touch. They work closely with large enterprises to ensure a proper deployement.

What do you dislike about EzyTise?
So far we haven't found something not working to our satisfaction.

What problems is EzyTise solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ezytise addresses the issue of capturing opportunities and systematically follow up on such opportunities.   Leads can be captured from all different angles (online website, online chat,  cold call, forms, automation, Google Ads, etc).

initial_reviews.review_title: The absolute best Sales & Marketing Automation CRM out there!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EzyTise?
We've been on other platforms and at some point, they were somewhat restrictive in their capabilities. With EzyTise, we can customize absolutely everything! If you can think of it, you can build the flow in EzyTise!

What do you dislike about EzyTise?
Initially we thought that their lack of direct integrations would be a factor but using Zapier to connect, we have never had an issue. They are also adding direct integrations regularly!

What problems is EzyTise solving and how is that benefiting you?
It has solved our need for multiple sales & marketing pipelines. Currently, I believe we have 6-8 and have another 4-6 on our roadmap that we are building out. No limits!
